title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.58 - Consultant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.58 - Consultant

State Regulations
A firm or person (normally not an employee), with
demonstrated expertise in a given field, who provides technical advice in that
field in order to improve the necessary day-to-day operation of a
facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.58

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
